title: MediaInfo.DotNetWrapper
description: MediaInfo.DotNetWrapper is a wrappper for the MediaInfo.dll (https://mediaarea.net/en/MediaInfo). MediaInfo is a convenient unified display of the most relevant technical and tag data for video and audio files.
